page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content:
HOUSING IN THE DRUMCHAPEL AREA IS MOSTLY TENEMENTS AND HIGH RISE FLATS. IN BEARSDEN THE HOUSES ARE MOSTLY SEMI-DETACHED AND DETACHED VILLAS AND BUNGALOWS. THE KNIGHTSWOOD AREA CONSISTS OF MORE MODERN MAISONETTES AND 4-IN-A-BLOCK COTTAGE FLATS.
THE QUALITY OF HOUSING DEPENDS ON THE AREA AND HOW MUCH MONEY PEOPLE AND COUNCILS HAVE.
AREAS SUCH AS BEARSDEN AND KNIGHTSWOOD DO NOT HAVE MANY HOUSING PROBLEMS ALTHOUGH SOME HOUSES IN TEMPLE NEED RENOVATION.
DRUMCHAPEL IS AN AREA WITH MANY PROBLEMS INCLUDING{OVERCROWDING}WITH AN AVERAGE OF{7 PEOPLE PER HOUSE. DAMPNESS AND VANDALISM ARE OTHER PROBLEMS. {
